sentences.en: " Over there in the corner -- way over. Do you see that brooch? "
sentences.cn: “ 那边角上 -- 还远一点, 你看见那枚胸针了 吗 ? ”

sentences.en: “No birthday, ” she repeated, fingering the brooch on her breast.
sentences.cn: “没有生日”，她复述道，一边玩弄着胸口的胸针。

sentences.en: “Ultimately, we envision the camera becoming so small that it integrates into clothing, such as the button of a shirt, a brooch, or a pendant”, he said.
sentences.cn: 帕特里克说：“我们想象一下，如果这个摄影机非常小巧，我们就可以把它放进衣服里，像衬衫扣子、胸针、或是项链的坠子一样。”

sentences.en: A lady with a large, sparkly spider brooch asks me what size I think she would take in a black dress she is admiring.
sentences.cn: 一位带着一枚大而闪亮的蜘蛛胸针的女士，正在欣赏着一件黑色的礼服，过来问我她能穿多大号的？

sentences.en: A silver brooch was pinned to her lapel.
sentences.cn: 她在翻领上别了一枚银色胸针.

sentences.en: Faceted seal brooch in Ocean Blue and Black Diamond crystal; rhodium - plated details.
sentences.cn: 在上雕琢平面的封印别针在海洋蓝色和黑金刚石水晶; 铑被镀的细节.

sentences.en: He bought her a gilt brooch.
sentences.cn: 他给她买了一枚镀金胸针。

sentences.en: Her brooch caught the rays of the setting sun.
sentences.cn: 落日余晖照射在她的胸针上.

sentences.en: Make the brooch look bluer, applying Image - Adjustments - Photo Filter.
sentences.cn: 点击图像 - 调整 - 图片滤镜将胸针的色调也变成蓝色.

sentences.en: My aunt give me one of her brooch as a keepsake.
sentences.cn: 我的姑母把她的一只胸针送给我作纪念.

sentences.en: Of course, her brooch could be pinned over the spot , but perhaps Melanie had sharp eyes.
sentences.cn: 当然, 她可以把别针别在那上面, 但眼尖的媚兰,可能会看出来.

sentences.en: Rhodium - plated brooch with 3 curved bars in clear crystal pav é.
sentences.cn: 铑被镀的别针与3个弯曲的酒吧在清楚水晶铺.

sentences.en: Rhodium - plated brooch with triangular elements in clear crystal and clear crystal pav é.
sentences.cn: 铑被镀的别针与三角元素在清楚水晶和清楚水晶铺.

sentences.en: She treasured the brooch because it was an heirloom.
sentences.cn: 她把这枚饰针视为珍宝,因为这是祖上传下来的.

sentences.en: She was wearing a small silver brooch.
sentences.cn: 她戴着一枚银质的小胸针.

sentences.en: That little girl is wearing a cameo brooch.
sentences.cn: 那小女孩戴着一枚浮雕宝石胸针.

sentences.en: The brooch could be pinned a little bit higher.
sentences.cn: 胸针可以再别高一点.

sentences.en: The brooch dates back to the fourth century BC.
sentences.cn: 这枚胸针的历史可以追溯到公元前4世纪。

sentences.en: The brooch is a family heirloom which came down to her from her great - grandmother .
sentences.cn: 这枚胸针是她家的传家宝，是从她曾祖母那一代传到她手中的。

sentences.en: The brooch is already sixty yuan off original price.
sentences.cn: 这枚胸针已经比原价低了60元.

trans.tran_en: a piece of jewellery that you fasten to your clothes, usually worn by women
